metadata.min_stack_comments: New fields added: required_fields, related_integrations, setup

author: Elastic
rule.description: Detects use of the systemsetup command to enable remote SSH Login.
rule.name: Remote SSH Login Enabled via systemsetup Command
rule.query:
event.category:process and host.os.type:macos and event.type:(start or process_started) and
 process.name:systemsetup and
 process.args:("-setremotelogin" and on) and
 not process.parent.executable : /usr/local/jamf/bin/jamf
